Upcoming.Title: Top Gun: Maverick
Upcoming.Summary: In the film, Maverick confronts his past while training a group of younger Top Gun graduates, including the son of his deceased best friend, for a dangerous mission.
Reviews: One of the greatest films ever made
Great movie fiction scenes which are actually real
I love Rooster and Hangman in this movie. Of course Maverick is my favorite character in this movie
Cast: Tom Cruise as Captain Pete Mitchell aka Maverick
Jennifer Connelly as Penelope Benjamin aka Penny
Miles Teller as Lieutenant Bradley Bradshaw aka Rooster
Val Kilmer as Admiral Tom Kazansky aka Iceman
Jon Hamm as Vice Admiral Beau Simpson aka Cyclone

Upcoming.Title: Black Adam
Upcoming.Summary: Reawakening after 5000 years, Black Adam becomes the world's ruthless protector: an anti-villain to take on the likes of Superman and Wonder Woman.
Reviews: Best superhero/villain movie made in a long time
The greatest superhero/villain movie character ever
The story of how Black Adam got his powers is very surprising
Cast: Pierce Brosnan as Doctor Fate (Kent Nelson)

Upcoming.Title: Bullet Train
Upcoming.Summary: The story takes place on a bullet train careening across Japan, but most of the movie was shot on green-screened sets, and the cityscapes and countrysides that the train rides through are mainly miniatures and CGI.
Reviews: I love Tangerine and Lemon in the movie, they are comical

Upcoming.Title: The Batman
Upcoming.Summary: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.
Reviews: One of the best Batman movies ever

Upcoming.Title: Uncharted
Upcoming.Summary: A young street-smart, Nathan Drake and his wisecracking partner Victor “Sully” Sullivan embark on a dangerous pursuit of “the greatest treasure never found” while also tracking clues that may lead to Nathan’s long-lost brother.
Reviews: One of the best Tom Holland movies made yet
Cast: Mark Wahlberg as Victor Sullivan aka Sully

Upcoming.Title: Violent Night
Upcoming.Summary: An elite team of mercenaries breaks into a family compound on Christmas Eve, taking everyone hostage inside. However, they aren't prepared for a surprise combatant: Santa Claus is on the grounds, and he's about to show why this Nick is no saint.
Reviews: Sweet-and-sour bedtime story of good triumphing over evile
It's an amusing idea, so it's really too bad that the actual action in Violent Night is so weak.
One of the biggest surprises of the year

Current.Title: The Room
Current.Summary: Johnny is a successful banker who lives happily in a San Francisco townhouse with his fiancée, Lisa. One day, inexplicably, she gets bored of him and decides to seduce Johnny's best friend, Mark. From there, nothing will be the same again.
Reviews: This movie is a timeless masterpiece
This is the best worst movie ever made.
In a class of its own is its overabundant idiocy
A terrible amateurish movie that becomes hilarious

Current.Title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
Current.Summary: A giant egg is unearthed at a construction site and soon opened, releasing the terrible Ivan Ooze, who wreaks vengeance on Zordon for imprisoning him millennia ago. With Zordon dying and their powers lost, the Rangers head to a distant planet to find the mystic warrior Dulcea.
Reviews: Well.... I guess you can call it a movie

Current.Title: Harold & Kumar Go To White Castle
Current.Summary: Nerdy accountant Harold (John Cho) and his irrepressible friend, Kumar (Kal Penn), get stoned watching television and find themselves utterly bewitched by a commercial for White Castle. Convinced there must be one nearby, the two set out on a late-night odyssey that takes them deep into New Jersey. Somehow, the boys manage to run afoul of rednecks, cops and even a car-stealing Neil Patrick Harris before getting anywhere near their beloved sliders.
Reviews: There's a decent pace to this,
It remains one of the greatest comedies

Current.Title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lava in 3-D
Current.Summary: Bullied by classmates, young Max (Cayden Boyd) escapes into a fantasy, conjuring up the action-packed lives of Lavagirl (Taylor Dooley) and Sharkboy (Taylor Lautner). But one day, Lavagirl and Sharkboy suddenly come to life -- and their world, Planet Drool, needs a hero named Max. As Max escapes to Planet Drool, he battles aliens and tries to save his new friends' planet from destruction. He also battles his bullies, who have become villains like the Ice Princess (Sasha Pieterse).
Reviews: The acting left a lot to be desired in this movie

Current.Title: Ratatouille
Current.Summary: Remy dreams of becoming a great chef, despite being a rat in a definitely rodent-phobic profession. He moves to Paris to follow his dream, and with the help of hapless garbage boy Linguini he puts his culinary skills to the test in the kitchen but he has to stay in hiding at the same time, with hilarious consequences. Remy eventually gets the chance to prove his culinary abilities to a great food critic but is the food good? A Pixar animation.
Reviews: The only rat I want in the Kitchen

Current.Title: Shark Tale
Current.Summary: Underachiever Oscar (Will Smith) is a pint-sized fish with grand aspirations. When mob-connected great white shark Frankie (Michael Imperioli) is accidentally killed, Oscar concocts a story with Frankie's peace-loving brother Lenny (Jack Black) that it was he who murdered the shark. Suddenly hailed Sharkslayer by his aquatic brethren, Oscar has bigger fish to fry when Frankie's father, mob boss Don Lino (Robert De Niro), dispatches his henchmen to track down his son's killer.
Reviews: Not up to Shrek level, but a feast for the eyes
It's an adequate time-killer that benefits from an impressive voice cast
